text: barakat bundle is inspired by the
finnish baby box which some of you may
have heard of and it's essentially a kit
that includes a series of newborn
essentials and information to support
mothers in providing care for their
babies at home and it's conditional on
attending prenatal clinics so that's
really important to be able to check in
on maternal health as well so together
we anticipate that barakat bundle will
reduce infant and maternal mortality in
south asia we will be putting this money
to good use this summer we plan on
piloting in pakistan we have a
partnership with the midwifery
association of pakistan and we will be
running focus groups interacting with
midwives and mothers to understand
get to get a greater sense of their
needs and then we will be developing the
prototype and piloting the project in
the state of gilgit baltistan before we
move on to scaling up the social
enterprise initiative has been
incredibly helpful we actually applied
what the real impetus for us was the
fact that at every stage of this
competition you get feedback so to us it
was a no-brainer we submit something we
get feedback win or lose we know what we
what our strengths are and what we can
improve on we want to make a difference
we want to put the money to good use we
want to be effective we want to be
efficient and we really want to reduce
preventable infant deaths in south asia
you
